name: Jaagriti An Awakening
briefDescription: Jaagriti is a youth-focused, volunteer driven initiative for improving the lives of the underprivileged migrant communities. Started in February 2009 to provide pre-school education to a small group of just 20 children, Jaagriti has now grown substantially in both scope and geographical coverage. In the last 5+ years of its operations, Jaagriti has influenced lives of 300+ children in 5 migrant communities with the support and dedication of over 500 volunteers.
